title: A Circus story
creator_credit: Marshall Riggan, Major Carpenter, Barr Films and Marshall Majors Productions
brief_description: An account of the arrival, setting up and the performance of a circus in the small town of Berrybille, Arkansas, USA. Discusses the status, role and function of the circus today and suggests reasons for the romantic appeal of the circus. Suitable for secondary school level.
creator_credit_for_label: Marshall Riggan, Major Carpenter, Barr Films and Marshall Majors Productions
